data.title: Measurements of the $\ensuremath{\tau}$ mass and the mass difference of the ${\ensuremath{\tau}}^{+}$ and ${\ensuremath{\tau}}^{\ensuremath{
data.meta_description: We present the result from a precision measurement of the mass of the $\ensuremath{\tau}$ lepton, ${M}_{\ensuremath{\tau}}$, based on $423\text{ }\text{ }{\mathrm{fb}}^{\ensuremath{-}1}$ of data recorded at the $\ensuremath{\Upsilon}(4S)$ resonance with the BABAR detector. Using a pseudomass endpoint method, we determine the mass to be $1776.68\ifmmode\pm\else\textpm\fi{}0.12(\mathrm{stat})\ifmmode\pm\else\textpm\fi{}0.41(\mathrm{syst})\text{ }\text{ }\mathrm{MeV}$. We also measure the mass difference between the ${\ensuremath{\tau}}^{+}$ and ${\ensuremath{\tau}}^{\ensuremath{-}}$, and obtain $({M}_{{\ensuremath{\tau}}^{+}}\ensuremath{-}{M}_{{\ensuremath{\tau}}^{\ensuremath{-}}})/{M}_{\mathrm{AVG}}^{\ensuremath{\tau}}=(\ensuremath{-}3.4\ifmmode\pm\else\textpm\fi{}1.3(\mathrm{stat})\ifmmode\pm\else\textpm\fi{}0.3(\mathrm{syst}))\ifmmode\times\else\texttimes\fi{}{10}^{\ensuremath{-}4}$, where ${M}_{\mathrm{AVG}}^{\ensuremath{\tau}}$ is the average value of ${M}_{{\ensuremath{\tau}}^{+}}$ and ${M}_{{\ensuremath{\tau}}^{\ensuremath{-}}}$.
data.text:
We present the result from a precision measurement of the mass of the τ lepton, Mτ, based on 423fb−1 of data recorded at the Υ(4S) resonance with the BABAR detector. Using a pseudomass endpoint method, we determine the mass to be 1776.68±0.12(stat)±0.41(syst)MeV. We also measure the mass difference between the τ+ and τ−, and obtain (Mτ+−Mτ−)/MAVGτ=(−3.4±1.3(stat)±0.3(syst))×10−4, where MAVGτ is the average value of Mτ+ and Mτ−.

3 More

DOI:https://doi.org/10.1103/PhysRevD.80.092005
